*The key to getting real maple flavor is using a dark amber Grade A or Grade B syrup, which are bolder than lighter Grade A varieties.

**To make candied bacon, lay 6 or 7 bacon slices on a wire rack set over a sheet pan lined with foil. Combine 1/4 cup light brown sugar with 1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon. Rub over both sides of bacon. Bake at 350°F until deeply caramelized, 30 to 35 minutes. Let cool before chopping into bits.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups (12 ounces/336 grams) water, room temperature (70°F to 90°F)
1 1/4 teaspoons instant yeast (also known as rapid-rise or bread machine yeast)
1 2/3 cups (8.7 ounces/244 grams) Gold Medal "Better for Bread" flour*
*If unavailable substitute 1/2 cup plus 1/3 cup (4.4 ounces/122 grams) bread flour and 1/2 cup plus 1/3 cup (4.4 ounces/122 grams) unbleached all-purpose flour.

name: Two-Bean Turkey Chili
ingredients: 1 can (28 oz/796 mL) tomatoes with juice, coarsely chopped
2 lbs skinless boneless turkey breast, cut into 1/2-inch (1 cm) cubes (see tips)
1 tbsp New Mexico or ancho chile powder, dissolved in 2 tbsp (30 mL) lime juice
1 can (4 1/2 oz or 127 mL) diced mild green chiles
1 jalapeño pepper or chipotle pepper in adobo sauce, diced, optional
Medium to large (31⁄2 to 6 quart) slow cooker

name: Broiled Mackerel with Onion and Pickle Butter
ingredients: 1/4 cup finely chopped mixed sweet pickles or dill pickle
6 (4- to 6-oz) pieces mackerel fillet with skin

name: Baby Tomato and Fresh Goat Cheese Salad
ingredients: 1 cup unseasoned fresh bread crumbs or panko
2 tablespoons each hazelnut, walnut, and olive oils, or any combination equal to 6 tablespoons
12 sprigs chervil or flat- leaf parsley

name: Pastrami Turkey Breast for the Best Thanksgiving Leftovers Sandwiches
ingredients: 1 Tbsp. Diamond Crystal or 1¾ tsp. Morton kosher salt
1 Tbsp. light or dark brown sugar
Mayonnaise, cranberry sauce, lettuce, and pickled red onion (for serving)

name: Old Bay Remoulade
ingredients: 1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. fresh lemon juice

name: Fish Tacos
ingredients: 1/4 cup lightly packed fresh cilantro leaves, chopped, plus more for garnish
1 pound flaky white fish (such as mahi mahi or cod), cut into 4 pieces

name: Chicken Cacciatore with Harissa, Bacon, and Rosemary
ingredients: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts or 8 skinless, boneless chicken thighs
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
5 ounces cremini or black poplar mushrooms
A good glug (about 1/2 cup) of Madeira (or red or white wine or chicken stock)
1 tablespoon harissa paste (you can get it from most supermarkets) or 3 tablespoons tomato purée

Small handful of fresh basil or parsley leaves (optional)
Large sauté pan, scissors, kettle, large saucepan with lid, colander

name: Pasta Pomodoro
ingredients: Pinch of crushed red pepper flakes
¼ cup finely grated Parmesan or Pecorino, plus more for serving
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter, cut into pieces

name: Old-Fashioned Graham Crackers with Turbinado Sugar
ingredients: 1/2 cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, at room temperature

name: Homemade Fire Cider Tonic
ingredients: 1 cup coarsely grated peeled horseradish (about 4 ounces)
1/2 cup peeled and coarsely grated or chopped ginger (about 3 ounces)
2 cups (or more) unfiltered apple cider vinegar
Fire cider can be made 3 months ahead; store chilled in a (preferably glass) resealable container.

name: Chocolate-Banana Soy Smoothie
ingredients: 1 packet No Sugar Added Rich Milk Chocolate Flavor CARNATION BREAKFAST ESSENTIALS® Complete Nutritional Drink

name: Rustic Bread
ingredients: 5 grams fresh cake yeast (about 1 packed teaspoon), crumbled

name: Memphis-Style Barbecued Pork Ribs
ingredients: Four 3-pound slabs pork spare ribs (also called St. Louis-style ribs), untrimmed
2 cups Neely's Barbecue Seasoning , plus more, as desired

name: Parsnip and Carrot Chips
ingredients: 1 teaspoon kosher salt or flaky or coarse sea salt

name: Maple Sugar Tartlets
ingredients: 1 stick (1/2 cup) cold unsalted butter, cut into small pieces
1/2 cup dark amber or Grade B maple syrup
3/4 stick (6 tablespoons) unsalted butter, melted and cooled
3 tablespoons granulated maple sugar (see cooks' note, below)
a pastry or bench scraper (optional); a 4 1/2-inch round cookie cutter; 8 (3 1/2-inch) fluted round tartlet pans; pie weights or raw rice

name: Grilled Lemongrass Lamb Chops with Herbs
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons cumin seeds, toasted and cooled

6 (1 1/4-inch-thick) loin lamb chops (2 to 2 1/2 lb total), end flaps secured with wooden picks
1/4 teaspoon finely grated fresh lime zest

name: Five-Herb Ice Milk
ingredients: a candy or instant-read thermometer; an ice cream maker

ingredients: 1 1/2 lb broccoli, trimmed and cut into 2- to 3-inch-wide florets (5 inches long)

name: Egg Salad With Grilled Broccoli and Chili Crisp
ingredients: 1½ lb. broccoli (about 3 small heads), cut into florets
2 tsp. Diamond Crystal or 1 tsp. Morton kosher salt, divided, plus more
1 tsp. freshly ground black pepper, divided, plus more
1–2 Tbsp. chili crisp (such as Fly by Jing, Lao Gan Ma, or homemade)
Country-style bread, sourdough, or flatbread (for serving)

name: Tamarind Mango Sangria
ingredients: 3/4 cup thawed frozen unsweetened tamarind purée
1 cup halved green and red seedless grapes
